mapper.select: SELECT UT.USER_NO AS user_no, UT.NAME AS name, UT.EMAIL AS email, UT.IMG_URL AS img_url, ATB.ACT_NO AS act_no, ATB.TOTAL_ACT_DISTANCE AS total_act_distance, ATB.TOTAL_ACT_TIME AS total_act_time, ATB.SHARE_ST AS share_st, DATE_FORMAT(ATB.REG_DT, "%Y-%m-%d") AS reg_dt FROM ACTIVITY_TB ATB INNER JOIN USER_TB UT ON ATB.USER_NO = UT.USER_NO WHERE ATB.SHARE_ST = 1 AND ATB.ACT_ST = 'finish';

SELECT ACT_NO AS act_no, TOTAL_ACT_DISTANCE AS total_act_distance, TOTAL_ACT_TIME AS total_act_time, SHARE_ST AS share_st, ACT_GB AS act_gb, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, "%Y-%m-%d") AS reg_dt FROM ACTIVITY_TB WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no} AND ATB.ACT_ST = 'finish';
SELECT LATITUDE AS latitude, LONGITUDE AS longitude FROM ACTIVITY_DISTANCE_TB WHERE ACT_NO = #{act_no};

SELECT ATB.USER_NO AS user_no, UT.NAME AS name, UT.EMAIL AS email,
SUM(ATB.TOTAL_ACT_DISTANCE) AS total_act_distance, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(ATB.TOTAL_ACT_DISTANCE) DESC) AS ranking
SUM(ATB.TOTAL_ACT_TIME) AS total_act_time, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(ATB.TOTAL_ACT_TIME) DESC) AS ranking
FROM ACTIVITY_TB ATB INNER JOIN USER_TB UT ON ATB.USER_NO = UT.USER_NO WHERE ATB.ACT_ST = 'finish' GROUP BY ATB.USER_NO ORDER BY RANKING ASC;
SELECT TRASH_NO AS trash_no, CATEGORY AS category, IMG_URL AS img_url, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, "%Y-%m-%d") AS reg_dt FROM ACTIVITY_TRASH_TB WHERE ACT_NO = #{act_no}
